description: Wish it would support markdown format
Works well, would adopt it at once, but no open-source, no way, thanks.

Like TreePad on Windows and CherryTree and others on Linux, this app is in a lineage of a certain type that some of us keep returning to over the years. I consider it essential tool for writing, collecting and organising notes. It's always annoying to read reviews that say that an app is great but give a low rating because they want features X, Y and Z. If every person had unlimited programming abilities, every one would create this kind of app differently. This implementation of the idea of a notes app with a tree navigator does it very well, with an easy, intuitive design and elegant simplicity yet a full set of features. Recommended.
summary: Excellent implementation of an essential app type

description:
FeatherNotes is clean and simple like gedit but with formatting capablities and of couse a wiki-like parent, sub and child categories. 

Being new to Linux, I started saving so much helpful info to plain text files but it was getting harder to read and keeping up with all the lines of text.  Feathernotes helps make it easier on the eyes to follow what I've written down -- not too heavy formatting just perfect enough to keep it simple, clean and categorized.
Хорошо подходит, например, для написания разного рода шпаргалок.
summary: Отличное приложение для ведения иерархических заметок
